title: YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet, Wide Shade 4/9-13 for TIG MIG ARC Weld Hood Helmet
descriptions:
YESWELDER True Color Solar Powered Auto Darkening Welding Helmet

A clear, comfortable helmet that makes welding easier and safer.

- Easy to see: “True Color” lens shows natural colors, so your work looks clear and crisp, not green or dull. Top optical clarity (1/1/1/1) means less eye strain.
- Fast protection: The lens darkens in 1/30000 of a second when you strike an arc. Your eyes stay protected without you needing to flip the lens up and down.
- Works for many jobs: Good for TIG, MIG, and MMA welding.
- Comfortable fit: Light weight with a pivot-style headband that adjusts to your head. Stays put without pinching. Comfortable for long use.
- Good view area: Viewing window is about 3.64 inches wide by 1.67 inches high—big enough to see your work clearly while staying protected.
- Reliable sensors: Two sensors detect the arc and darken the lens automatically.
- Long-lasting power: Solar powered with increased battery life. Less worry about charging or changing batteries.
- Easy to customize: Works with “cheater” or magnifying lenses to make small details easier to see.
- Adjustable shade: Shade range 4–13, so you can set it lighter or darker depending on the job.

Simple steps to use:
1) Put on the helmet and tighten the headband so it feels snug, not tight.
2) Set the shade number. Start darker for bright arcs, then adjust until comfortable.
3) Begin welding. The lens darkens automatically to protect your eyes.
4) When you stop, the lens returns to light so you can see your work.

Why you’ll like it:
- Clear vision, less eye strain.
- Comfortable fit for longer sessions.
- Automatic protection you don’t have to think about.

Weld with confidence and comfort with the YESWELDER True Color Helmet.
